tags: Phone Headset Ear or Speaker Cushions
full_summary:
**Earmuffs Tender Notice**
==========================

**Reference Number:** cb-8479-44644087
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247642/A
**Publication Date:** September 1, 2023
**Closes on:** October 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Contractors Wanted:**
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for ear cushions and related items. This tender notice invites interested contractors to submit their proposals in accordance with the tender specifications.

**Scope of Work:**
The delivery includes the following items:

* Item 1: Cushion, Ear (Part No.: CEP199-ESTP), Qty: 175 Units, to be delivered to 25 CFSD, Montreal by December 15, 2023.
* Item 2: Cushion, Ear (Part No.: CEP199-ESLP), Qty: 100 Units, to be delivered to 25 CFSD, Montreal.
* Item 3: Cable Assembly, Interface Device, Electrical (Part No.: CEP 503-105), Qty: 175 Units, to be delivered to 25 CFSD, Montreal.
* Item 4: Binaural Mini-Cep (Part No.: CEP109-C17(Rev1)), Qty: 150 Units, to be delivered to 25 CFSD, Montreal.
* Item 5: Headset, Electrical (Part No.: CEP508-C15-R1), Qty: 175 Units, to be delivered to 25 CFSD, Montreal.
* Item 6: Wiring Harness, Branched (Part No.: CEP900-104), Qty: 150 Units, to be delivered to 25 CFSD, Montreal.
* Item 7: Headset, Electrical (Part No.: CEP508-K04-R1), Qty: 400 Units, to be delivered to 25 CFSD, Montreal.

**Proposal Submission:**
Contractors are encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service. The tender documents are available for download in both English and French on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The Department of National Defence will evaluate proposals based on their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the tender specifications and their pricing.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender notice is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Col
